attributes.action: Regulate new and used car dealerships and to set up and Ombudsman.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Car dealerships at the present time have no regulation. (Except for the loans and protection products which are covered by the FSA) I propose that new and used car dealerships are regulated and have a compensation scheme in place like banks and building societies or at least an independent complaints process.
